Documentation Guide
===================

.. note::
   This page is in development.

To add documentation to a file, you need to create a virtual environment.

.. note::
  to do list
   - making venv
   - need to add pip install packages requirements.txt
   - build commands and caveats for development (ps make and path vars)


Edit the :code:`.rst` file 
in :code:`docs/source` and modify according to the 
`reStructuredText`_ syntax.

.. _reStructuredText: https://www.sphinx-doc.org/en/master/usage/restructuredtext/index.html
